mobs.LongDesc: An Imperial Scout is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: A lazy looking guard, he fingers his pistol as he looks at you suspiciously.

mobs.LongDesc: An Imperial Stormtrooper is here checking people's droids.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
An Imperial Stormtrooper, dressed in a white combat suit and armed with a 
medium sized handblaster.  You can't see his face because of the white battle
helmet on his head.

mobs.LongDesc: A communications trainee is engrossed in his work here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A young man who has just joined the Imperial ranks.  The recruit is still
learning how to do his job, and he has been placed on this backworld 
outpost where he can train without doing any permanent damage to the 
communications relays.  He is dressed in a jumpsuit of dark gray and has
a small blue square of rank on his chest.

mobs.LongDesc: A large black droid is here to guide in unexpected arrivals.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A large, humanoid droid of polished black metal.  It is only here in case
of a real emergency.

mobs.LongDesc: An Imperial Probe Droid lies against the wall, gathering dust.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A huge spider-like chunk of grey metal bristling with sensors, this is a
standard Imperial Probe Droid.  Long metal legs lie folded beneath it on
the storeroom floor.

mobs.LongDesc: The commander of the Imperial garrison is here filing reports.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A stocky man in a coal black uniform, he is busily filling out requisition
forms.  Though he is the commander of the planetary garison he is still
rather lowly ranked.

mobs.LongDesc: 'Drizzle' McGee is standing here, selling water from the collection chambers.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
If anyone on Tatooine understands the vapor collectors, it's Drizzle Mcgee...
He has been working with them since he was 10, and can manage them even 
without the help of a droid.  Drizzle earns his living selling water to the
townsfolk.

mobs.LongDesc: A large man leans against the wall on a stool.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This brawny man has been hired by the owners of the Cantina to keep
people from bringing in their droids (who don't drink) and taking up
unnecessary space.  He smiles and cracks his knuckles when he sees
you looking at him.

mobs.ShortDesc: Tar Lup, the Mos Eisley General Store owner
mobs.LongDesc: Tar Lup is waiting behind the counter, anxious to sell you something.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Tar Lup is a heavy man.  He rarely leaves the shaded confines of his
general store.  He seems to run a pretty stead business.

mobs.LongDesc: A snooty looking receptionist is standing here, looking down his nose at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The receptionist looks at you and sneers with contempt.

mobs.LongDesc: A bellhop in a bright red uniform waits to take your bags.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A young boy in a red uniform with gold epaulets.  He has a shifty look (the
same one you have seen on most of the denizens of Mos Eisley.)  A hefty tip
might ensure the welfare of your belongings (and it might not).

mobs.LongDesc: The manager of the hotel is seated at his desk, worrying over some reports.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The manager is careworn and has grown old before his time because of
the weighty responsibilities of his job.  Right now he is glancing
through some of the many status reports he receives from his employees
about the conditions of the inn.

mobs.LongDesc: A compact being with green skin is sitting in the booth.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Greedo is one of the many bounty hunters hired by Jabba the Hutt to 
capture or kill Han Solo.  With his multifaceted eyes, skull-ridge
spines, flexible snout and dusky green skin Greedo is a perfect
example of his species, the Rodians.

mobs.LongDesc: Chalamun, owner of the bar, is standing here polishing a glass.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Chalamun, a 7'8" Wookie, is standing here keeping a watchful eye on his
customers.  You can't help but overhearing two smugglers making an illicit
deal on behind him at the bar, however, if he heard he shows no signs of 
doing anything about it.  Perhaps that's how he's kept his business thriving
for so long.  He notices you peering at him and he grunts a loud NRAWWWUN!
and nods at you, signaling the universal greeting in Kashyyykese.

mobs.LongDesc: A Jawa is here chattering excitedly.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
It's a Jawa... not a lot can be said for it except that it really smells
awful!

mobs.LongDesc: Iggjel the Ithorian is sitting here drinking in silence.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Iggjel is a perfectly characteristic Ithorian.  He has a long, curving
neck and two mouths, one on each side of his broad head.  Having two
mouths gives his speech a strange "stereo" effect.  Despite their
their fearsome appearance, Ithorians are a gentle and peace-loving race.

mobs.LongDesc: An ugly ruffian is at the bar trying to pick a fight.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A brawny man in a wrinkled white jumpsuit accosts you.  He looks like
he has seen the losing end of very few fights.

mobs.LongDesc: A young man is here coughing on his drink.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This young man has come into Mos Eisley for the very first time.  His
older friends are trying to get him drunk.

mobs.LongDesc: An older man claps the young man on the back and laughs.
A terrifying droid stands here, guarding the safe.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This fearsome creation stands 8 feet tall.  It's appearance is slightly boxlike
and it has horrible looking claws where hands would be on a human.  It hums
with an inner energy, and comes towards you.

mobs.LongDesc: A custom officer asks you if you have anything to declare.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man is in charge of making sure noone smuggles anything into or out of
Mos Eisley.  What he DOES is rake in a percentage from the smugglers, while
busting enough small timers to keep his job.

mobs.LongDesc: A recruitment officer is standing here, encouraging you to enlist.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This young woman is devoted to showing you the joys of being in the
Tatooine Militia.  Believing any of her propaganda would be very  unhealthy
to your future.

mobs.LongDesc: An honor guard from the Tatooine Militia is standing at attention.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
These guards are part of the elite forces of the Mos Eisley regiment of the
Tatooine Militia.  They have spent half their lives dealing with scum like you
and will keep the peace at all costs.

mobs.LongDesc: A drunk has fallen asleep on the stairs here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This poor dervish might have been tossed out of the Cantina, or he might
have just passed out on his way in.

mobs.LongDesc: A hulking ruffian with the head of a spider is here egging on his pal.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The guy is absolutely hideous!  An ugly spider's head rests on the
shoulders of this bulky brute.

mobs.LongDesc: A small-time smuggler wanders through the crowd.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The guy is just trying to make an honest living smuggling contraband in
and out of the system.  To the large operations in the system he's little
better than cannon fodder to throw to the Imperials in the customs office.

mobs.LongDesc: A slick operator is here winning money from the locals.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The guy is just too lucky at cards!  No one wins THAT much!

mobs.LongDesc: A man from the desert near Mos Eisley is here losing at cards.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The poor guy is losing an awful lot of money to that card shark... another
half hour of this and he could lose his farm!

mobs.LongDesc: A drunk spaceman is here slumped over on the bar.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The poor spacer has had way too many drinks.  You sure don't envy him for
the nice hangover he's sure to wake up with.

mobs.LongDesc: A man from the desert is in here to quench his thirst.
mobs.DetailedDesc: Desert sand still clings stubbornly to the hem of his cloak.

mobs.LongDesc: Orun Depp is here sifting through some land deeds.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This thin fellow got to where he is today by backstabbing everyone who
ever thought he was their friend.  Definately not a man you can trust.

mobs.LongDesc: An Imperial junior officer looks at you nervously.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The junior officer looks like he feels out of place among the local
population... probably another conscript from out of the system.

mobs.LongDesc: A pretty secretary is here, blinking at her supervisor.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The secretary is young and skilled at her work.  Boy can she type!

mobs.LongDesc: A hulking alien lumbers through the throng.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This alien is huge and only vaguely humanoid.  Her long, thick neck 
is dwarfed by her massive shoulders.

mobs.LongDesc: A suspicious looking alien lurks in the shadows.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A thin little alien in a deep grey robe who is trying to fade into the
crowd. She seems to take an unhealthy interest in everything.

mobs.LongDesc: A thin man with shifty eyes avoids your gaze.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The slim man avoids your gaze and tries to melt into the crowd.

mobs.LongDesc: A tall, skinny alien looks at you and snickers.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This strange looking creature has what appears to be a large foot growing 
out of the top of his head.

mobs.LongDesc: A huge Wookie is standing here talking to a smuggler.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Wookie is huge!  Better not piss him off... Wookies have been known
to tear peoples' arms out of their sockets when they get annoyed.

mobs.LongDesc: A tall alien is here sipping a strange drink.
mobs.DetailedDesc: This alien is absorbed in drinking a foul-looking concoction.

mobs.LongDesc: A spherical little droid imperiously shouts demands at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The little droid is coated with a film of powdery sand.  Large sensors
totally cover its front side.  You have just been scanned for weapons.

mobs.LongDesc: A prosperous looking man looks at you suspiciously.
mobs.DetailedDesc: He is well dressed and appears to be a prosperous merchant.

mobs.LongDesc: A strong looking man is here to protect the trader's interests.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The bodyguard looks quite impressive.  He has bulging muscles and a very
unpleasant scowl on his battered face.

mobs.LongDesc: A member of the band is here playing an upbeat tune.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The alien has a huge domed forehead and large black eyes.  He is playing
some of the BEST music you have ever heard on a strange instrument.  The
band member doesn't look too tough... but then there are a lot of them
in the band...

mobs.LongDesc: A little mouse scurries for the corner.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The little brown mouse sees you and runs for cover.

mobs.LongDesc: A huge swivel cannon is covering you from the shadows under the Falcon.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The large cannon sticks out of the Falcon from a concealed port on
the bottom of the vessel.  It covers your movements with uncanny
ease. To get to the Falcon you'll have to go through it!

mobs.LongDesc: An Imperial Stormtrooper is here guarding the ships.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
An Imperial Stormtrooper, dressed in a white combat suit and armed with a
medium sized handblaster.  You can't see his face because of the white battle
helmet on his head.

mobs.LongDesc: An Imperial Stormtrooper patrols the noisy Cantina.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
An Imperial Stormtrooper, dressed in a white combat suit and armed with a
medium sized handblaster.  You can't see his face because of the white battle
helmet on his head.

mobs.LongDesc: A hissing, savage Rancor lurks nearby, jaws glistening with slobber.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Towering high above you, you see a ferocious, snarling Rancor.  Sniffing the
air, it notices your presence, throws back its head and lets out a loud roar.
It opens its jaws and snaps them shut over and over, while reaching towards
you with its 4-clawed hands.  A glistening drop of slobber forms at the
Rancor's mouth as it lurches toward you, mistaking you for its next dinner...

mobs.LongDesc: A large husky man, wearing a hood is here guarding his pet Rancor.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A large husky man is standing here, beside the gate, protecting the entrance
to his pet Rancor.  A slimey key is hung around his neck, it appears if you
want to kill his pet, you have to go through him first, and he doesn't look
too happy to see your intent to kill his pet.

mobs.LongDesc: The vile gangster, Jabba the Hutt lies here on his repulsorsled, eating a frog.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Jabba the Hutt sits here on his large repulsorsled, surveying the decadence
and scum he has assembled under his allegiance.  He reaches over beside him
and grabs a slimey frog-like creature from a bowl, and tosses it into his
large, open mouth.  Everything about this Hutt disgusts you, from the lingering
stench that surrounds him, to his slug-like appearance.  Growing impatient
at having an unwanted audience, he begins to flick his tail in annoyance.
He levels his glare at you and says, 'Da Eitha! Boscka!' and reaches for a
button on his sled...

mobs.LongDesc: The relentless bounty-hunter, Boba Fett stands here, leaning against the wall.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
His reputation preceeds him.  He is Boba Fett, one of the Galaxy's best
bounty-hunters.  His battle-worn Mandalorian battle armor has scratches
from various firefights and smuggling missions.  Having first donned his
armor in the Clone Wars, and in his service to the Empire in extinguishing
the Jedi, Boba Fett has created quite a name for himself.  A man of few words,
he leans against the wall, carefully sizing up whoever grabs his attention.
Seeing your intent to stir up problems for Jabba he arms his targetting 
computer and prepares for any disturbances.

mobs.LongDesc: A squat blue creature eyes you suspiciously.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He's blue.
He's an unindustrious good for nothing.
He's about three apples high.

mobs.LongDesc: A prosperous looking smuggler looks at you curiously.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The smuggler is dressed in high-quality (though quite filthy) clothing
and seems to be very good at his livelyhood.

mobs.LongDesc: A scruffy looking smuggler leers evilly at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A rather unextrodinary looking man.  He laughs evilly when he sees you
looking at him and winks suggestively.

mobs.LongDesc: A crazy looking, old man wanders around here in his shabby looking cloak.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Looking like a hermit, Ben Kenobi has liven a solitary life in harmony with
the Force, after the great Jedi Purge the Emperor ordered.  He stays out in
the desert to avoid drawing attention to his brother Owen and Luke their 
adopted son.  Darth Vader and the Emperor want Kenobi dead and would stop at
nothing if they knew he still existed, thus, he lives the life of a hermit.
Cloaked in a heavy, dusty, brown cloak, Kenobi rests his tired bones and
focuses on a jedi meditation exercise in order to prepare himself for the
upcoming battle.

mobs.LongDesc: Princess Leia Organa is here, chained to Jabba.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A stunningly beautiful woman, Princess Leia sits here chained to the 
disgusting Jabba the Hutt.  Upon being captured for impersonating Boushh
and freeing Han Solo from his carbonite imprisonment, Jabba made her his
slave girl.  Leia edges away from the advances of Jabba, only to have the
chain around her neck pulled and being dragged to that slimey tongue
sticking out from Jabba's mouth.  Yet, for some strange reason, she hasn't
lost hope, perhaps it's because she's one of the Rebellion's leaders and
has confidence in her brother Luke's plan to free them all from Jabba.

mobs.LongDesc: Bib Fortuna is here running an errand.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A member of the Twi'lek species, Bib Fortuna is a perfect example of his
race.  Cloaked in his dusty black robe, Bib serves as Jabba's right hand man.
From the back of his head, two long head-tails wrap around his shoulders in
the traditional Twi'lek fashion.  Noting your intention to bother his master,
Bib walks towards you and says, 'Die wanna wanaga.  Nee Jabba no badda.
Me chaade su goodie' and makes a sweeping motion at all your possessions.
Apparently he is threatening your death if you do not hand over all your 
items.

mobs.LongDesc: Salacious Crumb is here cackling evilly and looking for food dropped by Jabba.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Salacious Crumb is a vile little Kowakian monkey-lizard.  He is a greatly
favored member of Jabba the Hutt's degenerate court and always found near
his disgusting master, snatching up and eating any morsels that fall from
his mouth.  Salacious Crumb's habit of mimicking everything said around
him makes him EXTREMELY annoying!

mobs.LongDesc: Boushh the Bounty Hunter is here to collect a reward.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Something about this bounty hunter doesn't strike you as being right.
At a mere 5'5", this hunter claims to have captured the powerful Wookie
named Chewbacca.  He's wearing an Ubese battle outfit, and carries a 
thermal detonator.  Seeing your interest in him, he holds the detonator
out towards you and says, 'back away or they'll be picking your smelly
hide out of every crack in this room'  The raspy metallic voice doesn't
show any signs of bluff, and it looks as if he might actually do it.

mobs.LongDesc: An absolutely lethal looking bounty hunter stands here laughing.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This bounty hunter is tall and thin.  He carries with him the absolutely
lethal stench of death and decay wherever he goes.

mobs.LongDesc: A short, scrawny kid dressed in a blue jumpsuit stands here nervously, whining.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Wesley Crusher stands here nervously scuffing his foot, while trying to
figure out how he can get out of the predicament he is in.  He sees you and
begins to babble in some pseudo-technical explanation of how something named
the Enterprise had "transported" him down to this planet and said never to
bother coming back.  Becoming frustrated at being more intellectually
competent than you are he begins to fool around with some small object in his
hand.  You feel the EXTREME urge to kill him, and FAST!

mobs.LongDesc: A small, black box with feet is walking in a circle here, gonking..
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This small power droid saved the Universe.  Yes, it's the story of the 
almighty Gonk!!!!  Allowing himself to be tortured in Jabba's Palace (saving
R2 from the same fate), Gonk made R2 availible to give Luke his saber on the
Sail Skiff.  This self-less action of Gonk ended up saving the Galaxy from
the evil clutches of the Empire.  Only a mere power droid, Gonk saves the 
world and still has time to power up a few droids along the way.

mobs.LongDesc: A grimy bounty hunter scratches at her fleas.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A slight bounty hunter in grimy armor stands here scratching idly at
some of her fleas.  She obviously doesn't believe much in the concept
of 'Cleanliness is next to Godliness'.

mobs.LongDesc: A bizzare alien bounty hunter is here talking with its friends.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This bounty hunter is a rather strange alien breed.  You have seen
very few of his kind on the planet.

mobs.LongDesc: A Gammorean Guard looks at you and grunts.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A large pig-like creature stands here.  He grunts at you and swings
his massively muscled arms from time to time to swat at the biting
flies that swarm around him in dense clouds.

mobs.LongDesc: An exotic dancer is here.... dancing.  Well you think she is anyhow.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The dancer is thin and pretty.  She dances gracefully to the music of
the band.

mobs.LongDesc: A huge Bantha shambles through the sand.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A large elephant-like creature covered with long, thick brown fur, this
Bantha seems to overshadow you and provides a small relief from the sun.
2 long spiral horns grow out from behind the large eyes of the creature.
It makes a small grunting noise, as it'd much rather be eating some plant
than being stuck out in the desert.

mobs.LongDesc: A large womprat looks at you suspiciously from its hole.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
From a hole in the sand, you see a pair of glowing red eyes staring out
at you.  Rumors have it these carnivorous creatures travel in packs and
with their deadly claws and teeth, are more than capable of bringing down
a Bantha or two.  You leap back as a 3 foot long hairy rat comes charging
forth from the hole brandishing it's claws and teeth at you.

mobs.LongDesc: A large and menacing Tusken Raider lunges at you with his gaderffi stick!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A large, humanoid shape rushes at you with it's arms raised in the air.
It's movements are almost a blur, but you can seem to make out that a
deadly Tusken Raider, one of the Sandpeople, has decided he doesn't like
you invading his terrain.  Part of a savage nomadic tribe, the Raider
raises his gaderffi stick to bash your skull in.  Although extremely
fast, the heavy cloak causes the Raider to miss his first swing at you.
The Raider screams again through his breath mask and raises his stick again
to attack...

mobs.LongDesc: Han Solo is standing here, trying hard to see what is happening around him.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Smuggler.  Star Pilot.  Pirate.  Hero.  All of these can describe the man
known as Han Solo.  A hard-edged smuggler by trade, Han has his moments and
lets a little of his humanity show through.  Having been called a "low-down,
stuck-up, half-witted, scruffy-looking nerf-herder" Han still manages to
crack a joke or flash a sly smirk to anyone.  Thrust into the battle between
the Empire and the Rebellion, Han became a hero to his friends and the
Republic.  Currently, he is suffering from Hibernation Sickness from being
imprisoned in carbonite for so long.  He stumbles around half-blind trying
to find Chewie and figure out what Luke's plan is to free them all from the
vile clutches of Jabba the Hutt.

mobs.LongDesc: Luke Skywalker is here staring off into the desert wastes of Tatooine.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A short, sandy-blonde haired 20 year old, Luke Skywalker is a dreamer.
Like his name-sake, his life is among the stars.  Luke has an air of
impatience around him, and is always talking of joining the Academy and
going to other worlds.  With a sigh, Luke dusts off his white robe and
shrugs, feeling hopeless at not being able to leave this season of farming
for the Academy like his friends before him.  Hearing his Uncle Owen calling
him, Luke turns to go back to work, in the hope he can escape his boring
existence on the planet Tatooine.

mobs.LongDesc: Owen Lars, Luke's Uncle, is standing here fidding with the water vaporizer.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Owen Lars, a simple farmer, stands here fidgetting with the moisture vaporizer
trying to get it to understand the language Bocce.  Giving up, he throws his
hands in the air and grumbles about having to find another translator droid.
He calls out to Luke, telling him to get here and clean up their broken down
droid, so they can trade it in with the Jawa's tomorrow.  Upon hearing
Luke say he's going to Ben Kenobi's, Owen remembers his brother and sternly
tells Luke not to go or there'll be hell to pay.  He turns and goes in to
check on his wife and dinner..

mobs.LongDesc: Beru Lars, Luke's Aunt, stands here cooking some dinner for the family.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A quiet older woman, Beru keeps mostly to herself.  Her husband Owen is
too busy maintaining the vaporator, trying to scrounge through yet another
harsh, unproductive season.  Beru looks out the window at her adopted son
Luke, and feels a sense of sadness for the young boy, for she realizes his
heritage and swears never to tell him who his real father ever was.  Sighing,
Beru finishes cutting up another vegetable and begins to set the table for
dinner.

mobs.LongDesc: A thick, gnarled looking tentacle lashes out and grabs your leg!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A slimey, sand-encrusted tentacle shoots forth from the teeth lined maw of
the Sarlaac Pit.  It's grip on your foot is maddeningly tight and you
can barely keep your footing as it is.

mobs.LongDesc: Chewbacca the Wookie is here trying to protect his blind friend.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Standing at 2 meters tall, Chewbacca, is a prime example of his species the
Wookies.  Having served as co-pilot of the Millennium Falcon, Chewbacca has
demonstrated himself as being technologically competent.  Chewie is covered
with thick shaggy fur from head to toe.  Having been freed by Han Solo from
Imperial slavery, Chewbacca owes the smuggler a Wookie Life Debt and his
undying friendship to the pirate.  The two hundred year old Wookie sees you
and grunts a loud, 'Gwaaarrnk!' before raising his laser bowcaster and aiming
it in your direction.

mobs.LongDesc: Max Rebo sits here, nervously playing the drums, trying to stay alive.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Max Rebo, a Ortolan from the R'leyh sector, is galaxy-renowned for his
brilliant percussion playing.  When the villainous Jabba asked Max to play
for him, Max thought the food, money and fame would be worth staying in
Jabba's sight.  Max has since learned however, that he must keep playing until
Jabba dismisses him, and from the looks of it, Max has been playing a LONG
time.

mobs.LongDesc: Droopy McCool stands here, playing his wind instrument and sweating profusely.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Droopy McCool, a male Kitonak, is known across the galaxy for his melodious
rendition of Thall Joben's 87th Symphony.  Since his rise to fame and
popularity, Droopy has been in constant demand, however, his agent set him
up with the ultimate gig, playing for Jabba and his band of ragged mercenaries.
Sure he's being paid a ton of money to play, but if Jabba isn't satisfied,
he knows he won't last a second inside the stomach of the Sarlaac Pit, where
all of those who displease Jabba end up at.

mobs.LongDesc: Sy Snootles nervously dances in a circle, singing to keep from being killed.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Sy Snootles, one of the galaxy's best melodical singers, stands here dressed in
her skirt and top hat, dancing around in a circle.  Her pale yellow-green skin
and long limbs add to the show she puts on while singing.  At the end of her
long snout, you can see her mouth twitching.  Apparently the pressure of
having to perform or die is making her nervous.

mobs.LongDesc: Lando lies here, struggling with a tentacle, trying not to be pulled down.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Lando Calrissian.  Long time friend of Han Solo.  Ladies' man and
compulsive gambler.  As the former administrator of Cloud City, Lando 
can't believe how he got dragged into the struggle between the Empire
and the Rebel Alliance.  Currently, he's still wondering how he managed
to let Luke talk him into dressing up as one of Jabba's Sail Skiff Guards. 
Even more alarming to Lando is the fact that the Sarlaac Pit is dragging
him slowly into it's mouth, as his foot is securely grabbed by a tentacle.

mobs.LongDesc: A small blue and white R2 unit stands here chirping and whistling.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The small R2 unit you see before you is none other than Luke Skywalker's
brave little companion.  Currently he is outfitted with a drink holder
full of weird alien looking drinks.  Seeing you, he swivels his round
head and chirps wildly at you, trying to make you understand his quirky
language. Puzzled, you look at him sideways, just before you see a small
arm attachment slide out of a compartment and deliver a small electric
shock to you.  Apparently he is in a hurry to get somewhere and you are
in his way.

mobs.LongDesc: C3P0, Jabba's unwilling talkdroid, stands here nervously translating for Jabba.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Speaking fluently over 6million different forms of communication, C3P0 is
a very good protocol droid.  Over the course of his adventures with Artoo
however, he has learned to exaagerate and tell stories, something not
wanted in translations, but a valuable asset in making him seem more
human.  You can't help but have a slight dislike for the droid though, as
he constantly complains about something.  His nervous mannerisms, and
skittishness also adds to the frustration of dealing with this particular
unit.

mobs.LongDesc: A tall, slender assassin droid leans up against the wall here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A Phlutbattle droid, IG-88 is covered with carbon scoring from various
battles and bounty huntings.  Sleekly designed for stealth and combat,
IG-88 gives you a chill up your spine just thinking of having one of
these death machines programmed to hunt you down.

mobs.LongDesc: A large man, dressed in leather and wearing sunglasses, lurches over you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A very large and tall looking man stands before you dressed in black leather
pants, t-shirt, and black leather jacket.  He turns almost mechanically
and looks down at you.  His movements are very slow and you see him reach
for something inside his jacket.  With a blur of his hand, the man pulls
out a pair of Peril Sensitive Sunglasses (tm) and flips them onto his eyes.
From behind the glasses though, you see a red glow come from his eyes.
He then says, 'Hasta la vista, baby.  Havhfe you seen Sarah O'Connah??'
His accent is so sickenly thick you feel the extremely urge to take those
sunglasses of his smug face and punch him one in the face.

mobs.LongDesc: A two-headed, three-armed man sits here at the controls of the ship.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Formerly President, and the "owner" of the Heart of Gold (the only ship in
the Galaxy to run on an Improbability Drive and not turn everything into 
Spam (tm) in the process) sits here at the controls trying to figure them
out.  He turns his one head to the other and boggles, and throws his hands
up in the air!  Noting your arrival, Zaphod turns around and offers three
hands to shake.

mobs.LongDesc: An extremely depressed looking droid sits here, muttering to himself.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
*sigh* *sigh* *sigh* *sigh* *sigh* *sigh* *sigh* *sigh* *sigh* *sigh* *sigh*
*sigh*                                                                *sigh*
*sigh*         Your primitive intellect couldn't                      *sigh*
*sigh*                                                                *sigh*
*sigh*      understand what it's like to have the brain the           *sigh*
*sigh*                                                                *sigh*
*sigh*               size of a planet, and still be                   *sigh*
*sigh*                                                                *sigh*
*sigh*                             bored.                             *sigh*
*sigh*                                                                *sigh*
*sigh* *sigh* *sigh* *sigh* *sigh* *sigh* *sigh* *sigh* *sigh* *sigh* *sigh*

You *think* Marvin *might* be depressed.  Maybe asking him would be a bad
idea.

mobs.LongDesc: A sickenly cute, cuddly, furry, curious Ewok runs up to you and hugs your leg.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Cute.  Cuddly.  Soft.  Furry.  Innocent.  Sweet.  Kind.  Caring.  Cheery.
Playful.  Joyous.  Happy.  Smiling.  Bouncy.  Snuggly.  Warm.  Short.
Confusing.  Annoying.  Pushy.  Sickening.  Smelly.  Insistent.  Evil.
Death.  Kill.   Maim.  Destroy.  Mangle.  Hurt.  Rip.  Tear.  Rend.  Gnash.
Slay.  Poison.  Fire.  Guns.  Knives.  Cannons.  Rockets.  Missiles.  Tanks.
Machineguns.  Bombs.  Plagues.  Wars.  Famine.  Disease.  Destruction.
Fleas.  Nair.  *kill kill kill kill kill kill kill kill kill kill kill*

mobs.LongDesc: Yoda, the small ancient Jedi Master, sits here, gnawing on a gimmer stick.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A frail, three-foot tall green creature sits here, gnawing on a stick.  Small
tufts of hair protrude forth from his ears, making this creature appear
very old.  Seeing you stare at him, he twitches his long pointy ears and
smiles.  "Whnn 900 years old you reach, look as good you will not, eh?"
He starts to giggle and turn, his tattered grey robe moving with his small
frame.  Beckoning with his stick, he tells you, 'Come, good food, come" and
points off in the distance towards his home.  You see him raise an ancient
finger and you feel yourself begin to rise in the air.  Giggling, he stops,
and you feel your feet touch the ground once more.

mobs.LongDesc: Rosie, the Jetson's Maidbot, skitters around here cleaning things up.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Rosie.  The Jetson's faithful maid for all those years.  Her hard years of
picking up after them and taking care of Astro, have been for naught.  Now
she lives a life of enslavement and monotony.

mobs.ShortDesc: Dark Helmet, Dark Master of the Schwartz
mobs.LongDesc: Dark Helmet, Evil Guy at Large, slips his ring on, and gloats at you spitefully.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Seeing you walk into the room, Dark Helmet turns to glare at you and
begins fidgetting with a ring around his finger.  Strangely enough,
his whole armored outfit looks like a suit and tie, instead of a fear
inducing weapon of death.  Suddenly, Dark Helmet stumbles and you
can hear him electronically mutter, "I can't breathe in this thing!!"
as he reaches for his face plate.  Bracing for some horribly disfigured
face underneath, you are amazed when the face of Rick Moranis lies
underneath.  Having finally placed his ring upon his finger, Dark Helmet
turns and says, "I see your schwartz is as big as mine.." between
wheezy gasps of breath.
